unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for securing fresh talent. IIT Delhi and other top institutions are fertile grounds. We see strong potential in budding engineers, akin to discovering hidden gems like in "3 Idiots." Our Rs. 5 LPA starting package coupled with robust training programs is attractive. We plan visits to Mumbai, Chennai, and Bangalore campuses this November to boost our intake by 20%.
